alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 04 at 2:59PM PST until January 05 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Northern Elko County and Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 10 AM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northern Elko County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range
